page.title: 17Tourism 3
page.content:
The{Open-Air Theatre}in{Northstead {Manor Gardens}has an island stage and terraced seating for 8000. Summer musical performances and firework displays are held here. A central section of the lake is leased by the Council for the private hire of bumper boats.
The{Floral Hall}has a summer season of variety shows with first-class entertainers and occasional plays. It too belongs to{Scarborough}Council.
The only cinema is the seasonal {Hollywood Plaza.} It has a cafe attached and the private owner gives pre-film electric organ performances.
